Title: Series: The Seven Wonders of the World
Description: The Lighthouse of Alexandria; a seascape with the enormous tower on an island in the distance labelled "PHAROS"; on the mainland is a city and a snaking bridge leads to the island; in the foreground King Ptolemy converses with an artist; decorated border; copy of a print by Magdalena de Passe after Maarten de Vos. Engraving
Curator's comments: Copy of a series of seven plates published by Crispijn de Passe (Hollstein 72-78 ad).
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (1312, copy b) (Vos)
Franken 1881 / L'oeuvre gravé des van de Passe (327, copy)
Associated names: Representation of: Ptolemy I Soter I
Acquisition notes: For comment on the likely provenance from Sloane, see Qq,6A.1.
